docs.text: i was fortunate enough to attend an advance screening for the upcoming thriller conspiracy theory .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this was , of course , a big deal for me because reviewing movies is basically just a hobby for me and i never get a chance at something like this .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: not only did i get to see an advance screening , i was able to see an advance screening of a * very good * movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the very fast-paced film stars mel gibson as jerry fletcher , a fast-talking , witty , comical taxi driver in new york city .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gibson's performance is terrific , and his character is similar to that of martin riggs in the lethal weapon films .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gibson again teams up with richard donner , as he did in the lethal weapon films and maverick , and this time around , the combination works even better .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the character of jerry fletcher is indeed unique .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: try to imagine a toned-downed version of travis bickle who , this time around , is a jittery guy with knowledge of government conspiracy cover-ups .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: if you can imagine that , then you've basically got jerry fletcher .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in many ways , i was surprised by this movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: to begin with , i was surprised at how good it was .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: don't get me wrong , it's not going to be accepting any gold trophies next spring , but it was a very enjoyable movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: secondly , i was surprised at mel gibson's performance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he provided a fantastic performance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the previews of this film led me to believe it was an all-out action flick , which after viewing , it was almost the opposite in a certain sense .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gibson's character has an almost uncountable number of one-liners , hilarious situations , and his character is one that the audience tends to side with throughout the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: for instance , jerry's apartment ( and especially his security ) is memorable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and last , i was surprised at how good the plot is .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: writer brian helgeland has created a terrific story , and when watching this film , you are left to wonder if all of jerry fletcher's far-fetched ( or so they seem at first ) conspiracy theories are helgeland's own opinions .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: mel gibson isn't the only stand-out in the film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: julia roberts is very good in her performance as alice sutton , the department of justice employee who can't seem to stay away from jerry fletcher , who continually visits alice in hopes that she will do something about his theories .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he also seems obsessed and in love with her .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but whenever he approaches her with another one of his theories , she shrugs him and his beliefs off , continually noting that one day she is going to slap a restraining order on him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: jerry , obviously determined to continually seek out the truth , continues to research information for his next conspiracy theory , which will be printed in his newsletter ( same title as the movie ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although he only has five subscribers , he puts a large amount of time and effort into his work , and publishes his next edition .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: very soon after he does so , he is abducted and tortured by a sinister man who refers to himself as dr . jonas ( patrick stewart ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after barely escaping alive , jerry is forced to turn to the only person he can trust : alice sutton .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the remainder of the film is almost always fast-paced and full of action and suspense , with jerry's life being constantly put into jeopardy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and more along the way , the audience ( and alice ) learn more and more about jerry's life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: many things are explained throughout this film , both to the characters and to the audience .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: for instance , the meaning of the book " the catcher in the rye " and its ties to assassins , the reason lone gunmen have three names ( e . g .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: lee harvey oswald and james earl ray ) , and the real truth behind the grateful dead .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: make sure listen closely throughout the film , as jerry is constantly throwing out interesting tidbits such as the above .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: definitely , when conspiracy theory hits theaters august 8th , make sure you are standing in line to see it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i am nearly positive everyone should enjoy this film , especially if you are into an action-thriller with witty dialogue and numerous suspenseful situations .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and even if you aren't , you should still like this film .
docs.label: positive
